title: Spurrier to be paid through season's end despite resignation
text:
Spurrier to be paid through season's end despite resignation Sporting News 18 hrs ago zac.alkhateeb@sportingnews.com (Zac Al-Khateeb) © USA Today 13 Best Steve Spurrier Quote: s: The Man Who Invented 'Talking Season' Despite his well-publicized resignation , former South Carolina coach Steve Spurrier still stands to make a lot of money this season.
AdChoices According to reports from The State , Spurrier will be paid his full $4 million pay through the end of the season, and stands to make $920,000 through the end of the year.
MORE: Seven schools Spurrier trolled more than anybody else | Steve Spurrier did the unthinkable: He quit on his team
When asked why Spurrier was still going to be paid, South Carolina athletic director Ray Tanner said, "“All circumstances are different, especially in collegiate athletics with major college coaches.”
Co-offensive coordinator Shawn Elliott, who was named interim head coach amid Spurrier's resignation, stands to earn $430,000 this year, based on his salary.
